title: Triumph Diagnostic Tool New Feature - Smart Scan

body.body: Triumph Diagnostic Tool New Feature - Smart Scan
We would like to introduce the new Triumph Diagnostic Tool (TDT)
Smart Scan
feature.
The new Smart Scan Smart Scan feature (formally known as ECM Status) will be added at the
update.
The Smart Scan feature has been upgraded to include new functionality as follows:
Smart Scan - Summary Page
From the Summary page, it is possible to view and print a summary of a motorcycle's calibration and DTC status (as per the previous ECM Status Report).
For new motorcycles at PDI, it will now also be possible to unlock motorcycles from the Summary page.
Smart Scan - Download Page

body.name: Smart Scan - Download Page - Updates Available

body.body: From the Download page, it is now possible to automatically update all motorcycle ECMs within one simple workflow.
This feature automatically selects all calibration files for download based on the Model and Market Variant identified.
All downloads are optimised where possible, to ensure the fastest possible download time.
Smart Scan - DTCs Page

body.name: Smart Scan - DTCs Page - DTCs Stored - Expanded

body.body: From the DTCs page, it is now possible to view and erase DTCs for all motorcycle ECMs in one place.
This feature includes the ability to produce a PDF DTC Report detailing all DTCs stored on the motorcycle.
Updates to the Main Menu Download Area

In addition to the above, the existing Download area located on the diagnostic tool main menu has been updated. This area now includes a Smart Scan based pre download scan for models supported by the Smart Scan feature.
Full details of the new features are provided in the following Technical Bulletin items.
